#include "../deptran/__dep__.h"
#include "server.h"
#include "../deptran/raft/server.h"
#include "client.h"

namespace janus {

int64_t ShardKvServer::GetNextOpId() {
  verify(sp_log_svr_);
  int64_t ret = sp_log_svr_->site_id_;
  ret = ret << 32;


  ret = ret + op_id_cnt_++; 
  return ret;
}

int ShardKvServer::Put(const uint64_t& oid, 
                  const string& k,
                  const string& v) {
    // lab_shard: fill in your code
    auto &svr = GetRaftServer();

    uint64_t index, term;

    auto cc = make_shared<MultiStringMarshallable>();
    cc->data_.push_back(to_string(oid));
    cc->data_.push_back("put");
    cc->data_.push_back(k);
    cc->data_.push_back(v);

    auto cmd = dynamic_pointer_cast<Marshallable>(cc);
    bool ok = svr.Start(cmd, &index, &term);

    if(!ok) {
      return KV_NOTLEADER;
    }

    Coroutine::Sleep(OP_TIMEOUT);



    if(shardOps.find(to_string(oid)) == shardOps.end()) {
      return KV_TIMEOUT;
    }
    return KV_SUCCESS; //
}

int ShardKvServer::Append(const uint64_t& oid, 
                     const string& k,
                     const string& v) {
    // lab_shard: fill in your code
    auto &svr = GetRaftServer();

    uint64_t index, term;

    auto cc = make_shared<MultiStringMarshallable>();
    cc->data_.push_back(to_string(oid));
    cc->data_.push_back("append");
    cc->data_.push_back(k);
    cc->data_.push_back(v);

    auto cmd = dynamic_pointer_cast<Marshallable>(cc);
    bool ok = svr.Start(cmd, &index, &term);

    if(!ok) {
      return KV_NOTLEADER;
    }

    Coroutine::Sleep(OP_TIMEOUT);



    if(shardOps.find(to_string(oid)) == shardOps.end()) {
      return KV_TIMEOUT;
    }
    return KV_SUCCESS; //
}

int ShardKvServer::Get(const uint64_t& oid, 
                  const string& k,
                  string* v) {
    // lab_shard: fill in your code
  auto &svr = GetRaftServer();
  uint64_t index, term;

  auto s = make_shared<MultiStringMarshallable>();
  s->data_.push_back(to_string(oid));
  s->data_.push_back("get");
  s->data_.push_back(k);

  auto cmd = dynamic_pointer_cast<Marshallable>(s);
  bool ok = svr.Start(cmd, &index, &term);

  if(!ok) {
    return KV_NOTLEADER; // retry on different server
  }

  Coroutine::Sleep(OP_TIMEOUT); // sleep for 700 milliseconds and check
  if(shardOps.find(to_string(oid)) == shardOps.end()) {
    return KV_TIMEOUT;
  }

  *v = kv_store_[k];
  
  return KV_SUCCESS; //
}

void ShardKvServer::OnNextCommand(Marshallable& m) {
    // lab_shard: fill in your code
  auto s = (MultiStringMarshallable*)(&m);
    
  auto& svr = GetRaftServer();


  /* get committed operations into a queue*/
  auto data = s->data_;

  auto oid = data[0];
  auto op = data[1];
  auto key = data[2];


  if(data[1] == "put") {
    kv_store_[data[2]] = data[3];
  } else if(data[1] == "append") {
    kv_store_[data[2]] += data[3];
  }


  shardOps.insert(oid);
}

shared_ptr<ShardKvClient> ShardKvServer::CreateClient(Communicator* comm) {
  auto cli = make_shared<ShardKvClient>();
  cli->commo_ = comm;
  verify(cli->commo_ != nullptr);
  static uint32_t id = 0;
  id++;
  cli->cli_id_ = id; 
  return cli;
}

} // namespace janus;
